entities.name: crabbe
entities.description: Crabbe is mentioned as one of the students who followed Harry and Goyle.

entities.name: goyle
entities.description: Goyle is mentioned as one of the students who followed Harry and Crabbe.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the student who said 'Just looking' and then walked away with Crabbe and Goyle.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as one of the students who hurried down the front steps into the grounds along with Harry and the other Gryffindors.

entities.name: gryffindors
entities.description: Gryffindors are mentioned as a group of students who hurried down the front steps into the grounds.

relationships.description: Harry was followed by Crabbe and Goyle.
Harry was followed by Crabbe and Goyle.
Ron is part of the group of Gryffindors who hurried down the front steps into the grounds.
